title: Fix invalid generated domain/slug causing deployment failure

requirements.text: Update the project’s deployment-facing name/slug source so it generates a valid domain label (5–50 characters; only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens) and does not include parentheses, plus signs, spaces, or non-ASCII hyphen characters.

quotes: Domain falconrock-consulting-(virtualization-+-on‑prem-ia must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

acceptanceCriteria: A deployment no longer fails with the domain/slug validation error shown in the issue.
The generated domain/slug value is between 5 and 50 characters.
The generated domain/slug value contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens (no spaces, parentheses, plus signs, or special hyphen characters).

requirements.text: In project_state.json, change the value that is currently used as the project name ("Falconrock Consulting (virtualization + on‑prem IA for government contracts)") to a slug-safe value that meets the domain/slug constraints.

quotes:
Fix this issue:

Domain falconrock-consulting-(virtualization-+-on‑prem-ia must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

acceptanceCriteria: project_state.json no longer contains parentheses/plus signs/non-ASCII hyphen characters in the project name value used for domain/slug generation.
The updated project name value is 5–50 characters and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
Deployment proceeds past the domain/slug validation step using the updated value.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.

Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not change the public website branding domain (falconrock.app) shown in frontend/src/config/branding.ts unless required to resolve the deployment error.
Do not add new marketing site pages or new backend features as part of this fix.
